Package kkadak.fujitsutask.cron

Class WeatherDataImporter

java.lang.Object
kkadak.fujitsutask.cron.WeatherDataImporter
@Component @PropertySource("classpath:application.properties") public class WeatherDataImporter extends Object
Class used for importing weather data to the WeatherData table

    • scheduleFetch

      public void scheduleFetch()

    • fetchAndSave

      public void fetchAndSave()
      Fetches the data from Estonian Environment Agency and saves it to the database for the stations declared in WeatherStationTranslator

      Configured to automatically run using cron expression in application.properties file
